label.name: Page Name
label.title: Page Title (for the <title>)
label.keyword: Key Word (Please seperate key words by ','.)
label.path: Path ( No support for characters like &lt\:*?"|,;> ，Cannot start or end with '/'，format: dir1/dir2; leave it blank if it is the index page.)

check.name: Page name cannot be blank.
check.title: Page title cannot be blank.
check.path2: Repeated page path, please enter another name.

flo.createok: The specified category has been generated.
flo.invalid: The specified category has already been deleted.

alert.saveok: Saved.Saved,if adding new Pages, please click Enter!
